long_description: When your young outdoor explorer needs a pant that can keep up with him on the trail, the Marmot Cruz Convertible Pant satisfies every requirement and is sure to become a favorite. Lightweight, quick-dry nylon is breathable, packable and abrasion resistant; a Durable Water Repellant finish helps keep him dry under light precipitation. Nylon fabric contains integrated UPF 30, minimizing risk of sun exposure while outside for long periods of time. Marmot Cruz Convertible Pant features 24 in. inseam that converts to a 7.5 in. inseam short when the lower pant legs are removed. Lower leg side zippers simplify getting pants on and off over boots. Zippered side pocket keeps small valuables secure. Seat gusset improves mobility; soft DriClime(R) interior waistband adds comfort where material meets skin.
